title: 09/22/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 09/22/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
Colin pushes back against Aaron Rodgers calling out the media for creating “false narratives” by pointing that Rodgers is the one who put himself in this situation. He has bad news for the Steelers as quarterback Ben Roethlisberger is dealing with another injury and what this says about their future without him. He reacts to rookie QB Justin Fields getting announced as the starter in week 3 against the Browns. Plus, Fox Sports College Football analyst Joel Klatt joins the show to tell Colin if the field of contenders for the National Championship is as wide open as it has ever been.  

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
